verbs.description: [ARG0: russia] [V: says] [ARG1: it is ‘ preparing for war’ following u s withdrawal from missile treaty a top russian official has declared that the country is preparing for war following president donald trump announcement that the u s would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee]

russia says it [V: is] ‘ preparing for war’ following u s withdrawal from missile treaty a top russian official has declared that the country is preparing for war following president donald trump announcement that the u s would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee

russia says [ARG0: it] is ‘ [V: preparing] [ARG2: for war’] [ARGM-TMP: following u s withdrawal from missile treaty] a top russian official has declared that the country is preparing for war following president donald trump announcement that the u s would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee

russia says it is ‘ preparing for war’ [V: following] [ARG2: u s withdrawal from missile treaty] a top russian official has declared that the country is preparing for war following president donald trump announcement that the u s would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee

russia says it is ‘ preparing for war’ following u s withdrawal from missile treaty a top russian official [V: has] declared that the country is preparing for war following president donald trump announcement that the u s would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee

russia says it is ‘ preparing for war’ following u s withdrawal from missile treaty [ARG0: a top russian official] has [V: declared] [ARG1: that the country is preparing for war following president donald trump announcement that the u s would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday] against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee

russia says it is ‘ preparing for war’ following u s withdrawal from missile treaty a top russian official has declared that the country [V: is] preparing for war following president donald trump announcement that the u s would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee

russia says it is ‘ preparing for war’ following u s withdrawal from missile treaty a top russian official has declared that [ARG0: the country] is [V: preparing] [ARG2: for war] [ARGM-TMP: following president donald trump announcement that the u s would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday] express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee

russia says it is ‘ preparing for war’ following u s withdrawal from missile treaty a top russian official has declared that the country is preparing for war [V: following] [ARG2: president donald trump announcement that the u s would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday] express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee

russia says it is ‘ preparing for war’ following u s withdrawal from missile treaty a top russian official has declared that the country is preparing for war following president donald trump announcement that the [ARG1: u] [V: s] would be withdrawing from a cold war - era disarmament treaty what are the details according to the u k sunday express the first committee of the u n general assembly voted friday against russia proposal to save the intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty inf between its country and the u s following president trump announcement that the u s would be unilaterally withdrawing from the 1987 agreement in response deputy head of the department of nonproliferation and arms control at the russian foreign minister andrei belousov told the u n here recently at the meeting the united states said that russia is preparing for war yes russia is preparing for war i have confirmed it we are preparing to defend our homeland our territorial integrity our principles our values our people — we are preparing for such a war he reiterated belousov … united nations general assembly u k mikhail gorbachev u s united states deputy head andrei belousov president nevada ronald reagan donald trump intermediate - range nuclear forces department of nonproliferation and arms control official the new york times u n u n general assembly un sunday express president donald trump intermediate range nuclear forces russia first committee
